statements: SELECT * FROM HealthAnalytics
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM HealthAnalytics WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension'
SELECT patient_name, age, admission_date FROM HealthAnalytics WHERE age < 40 ORDER BY admission_date DESC
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM HealthAnalytics WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM HealthAnalytics WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%Diabetes%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT * FROM HealthAnalytics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM HealthAnalytics WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY admission_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, admission_date FROM HealthAnalytics WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY admission_date DESC, patient_id ASC;
SELECT patient_name, discharge_date FROM HealthAnalytics WHERE admission_date >= '2021-01-01' AND diagnosis = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY discharge_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT diagnosis FROM HealthAnalytics WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY diagnosis ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT patient_id, record_date FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_name, address, record_date FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE treatment_plan IS NOT NULL ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, purpose FROM appointments WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patients WHERE gender='Male' AND phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;

SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_records.diagnosis, medical_records.prescription FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE medical_records.doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith';

SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time, doctor_name FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' AND prescription IS NOT NULL ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_location FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT diagnosis_description, diagnosis_date FROM diagnoses ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT visit_id, visit_date, doctor_name FROM visits WHERE patient_id = 5 ORDER BY visit_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_location FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, visit_date, doctor_name FROM patients JOIN visits ON patients.patient_id = visits.patient_id ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis_description FROM patients JOIN diagnoses ON patients.patient_id = diagnoses.patient_id WHERE patient_age >= 50 ORDER BY diagnosis_date ASC;

SELECT patient_name, diagnosis_description, medication_name, frequency FROM patients JOIN diagnoses ON patients.patient_id = diagnoses.patient_id JOIN medications ON patients.patient_id = medications.patient_id WHERE medication_name LIKE '%Aspirin%' ORDER BY medication_name;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, visit_date, doctor_name, visit_purpose FROM patients JOIN visits ON patients.patient_id = visits.patient_id WHERE visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients;
SELECT treatment_name, cost, treatment_date FROM Treatments WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT provider_id, name, specialty, location FROM Providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_id, provider_id, appointment_date, duration_minutes FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY treatment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, specialty, location FROM Providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY name LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
